statement.tex: %text Differentiate the following with respect to $x$ \[ \qquad x^{\sin x} + (\sin x)^{\cos x} \] %
\\ %text In \[ y = \underbrace{x^{\sin x}}_A + (\sin x)^{\cos x}\], what is \[\frac{dA}{dx}\]? %
\\ %text Similarly, what will \[\frac{dB}{dx}\] be in \[ \qquad y = x^{\sin x} + \underbrace{(\sin x)^{\cos x}}_B ?\] %
